t: Universal Interactive - Sega Retro
s: January 17, 2024 - In 2000, Universal Studio's parent company Seagram sold itself to French conglomerate, Vivendi, becoming Vivendi Universal with the beverage business being divested. Vivendi, already owning several video game companies under Havas Interactive, merged Universal Interactive into Havas Interactive to create Vivendi Universal Publishing. t: Universal Interactive | Gingo Wiki | Fandom
s: March 10, 2025 - Universal Interactive formerly Universal Interactive Studios was an American video game publisher. The foundation of Universal Interactive Studios was announced by MCA Inc. on January 4, 1994. Leading key personnel for the foundation were Skip Paul and Robert Biniaz.
